output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - Contains CMF 11240017, which indicates it's electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: - Directly mentions and tags Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate - Also mentions Victor Negrescu and PSD leadership
3. Addresses wide population: - The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses inclusive language addressing all Romanians
4. Electoral objective: - Presents Marcel Ciolacu and PSD in a very positive light - Credits them with Romania's Schengen success - Emphasizes their diplomatic abilities and leadership - Links success to PSD's capability to lead
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly not journalism - It's a promotional message highlighting PSD and Ciolacu's achievements - Uses persuasive language rather than objective reporting - Has a clear political agenda

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement - Has clear electoral objectives - Promotes achievements and capabilities of both the candidate and party - Published after the end of the presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: Media Smart SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1546185322672477) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, continand promovarea directa a candidatului prezidential Marcel Ciolacu si a PSD. Materialul contine numar CMF (11240017), prezinta realizari si promisiuni electorale, fiind distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un reach estimat intre 100,001-500,000 persoane. Mesajul promoveaza explicit candidatul la presedintie Marcel Ciolacu, subliniind capacitatile sale de lider si realizarile in contextul aderarii la Schengen, av√¢nd un evident caracter de propaganda electorala in perioada in care aceasta este interzisa prin lege.
